live_local_act_context.summary: The Live Local Act is a Florida law that grants major property tax exemptions to multifamily owners who offer a portion of their units at affordable rent levels. Clients need us because we handle the full compliance process — from income certification to county filings — ensuring they maximize savings without burdening their team or missing critical deadlines.
live_local_act_context.value_proposition: We handle the full compliance process to maximize tax savings while protecting clients from costly mistakes

common_objections.too_expensive: Show ROI from tax savings vs. our fee - exemptions typically dwarf our cost
common_objections.can_do_it_myself: Process involves income audits, FHFC certification, navigating county requirements, strict deadlines. Most underestimate complexity - small missteps cost tens or hundreds of thousands in lost exemptions.
common_objections.not_sure_it_applies: Offer free assessment of their property portfolio for Live Local Act eligibility

tone_examples.first_reminder_7_days: Hi [Name], I'm reaching out about Invoice [#] for $[amount] which is now 7 days overdue. Please let me know if there's anything preventing payment or if you need any documents from us.
tone_examples.second_reminder_14_days: Hi [Name], Following up on Invoice [#] for $[amount], now 14 days overdue. We haven't received payment or a response to my previous email. Please provide an update on payment status.
tone_examples.third_reminder_21_days: Hi [Name], Invoice [#] for $[amount] is now 21 days overdue. We need to resolve this promptly. If there's an issue preventing payment, please contact me directly at 305-902-6154.
tone_examples.escalation_30_days: Hi [Name], Invoice [#] for $[amount] is now 30+ days overdue despite multiple contact attempts. This requires immediate attention to avoid service disruption. Please contact me today.
tone_examples.document_request: Absolutely - I'm sending our [W-9/COI] right now. Is there anything else your AP department needs to process payment?
tone_examples.payment_confirmation: Thank you for confirming. I'll watch for the payment and update our records. Let me know if you need anything else.
